T02D1221:20b-3: dgyes pa rdo rje'i mandala gyi cho ga /
T02D1221:20b-4: dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1221:20b-5: rnam par smin pa'i lus kyi snying gar nyi ma'i
T02D1221:20b-6: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'u% zla ba'i gzi ltar
T02D1221:20b-8: de las 'od zer dkar po spros pas lus bkang ste /
T02D1221:20b-9: sdig pa dag par bsams la /
T02D1221:20b-10: de nas stong pa nyid bsgoms la h'u% zhes brjod
T02D1221:20b-11: pas bdag nyid las kyi he ru ka zhal gcig
T02D1221:20b-13: de'i spyi bor zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du aom dkar po bsams te /
T02D1221:21a-1: mar padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i steng du a'a:dmar po bsam /
T02D1221:21a-2: snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'u% sngon po bsams la /
T02D1221:21a-3: aom a'a:h'u% raksha raksha h'u% h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1221:21a-6: ba'i rnam lnga la sogs pa la aom a'a:h'u% bzlas la /
T02D1221:21a-7: aom badzra re khe h'u% zhes zlos shing /
T02D1221:21a-9: de nas lag pa bshal te thal mo sbyar nas phan yon brjod par bya'o //
T02D1221:21a-10: chu bcas lci ba sbyin pa yin //
T02D1221:21a-11: skyang nul byas pa tshul khrims yin //
T02D1221:21a-12: grog ma sogs bsal bzod pa yin //
T02D1221:21a-13: bya ba brtsams pa brtson 'grus yin //
T02D1221:21a-14: skad cig rtse gcig bsam gtan yin //
T02D1221:21a-15: ri mo snyoms pa shes rab yin //
T02D1221:21a-16: thub pa'i mandala byas pas pha rol phyin drug de dag rnyed par 'gyur //
T02D1221:21a-17: lha mi khyad par can skye zla ltar gzi 'phags shing //
T02D1221:21a-18: nad kun las grol gser gyi mdog dang 'dra bar 'gyur //
T02D1221:21a-19: rgyal rigs 'bru dang gser sogs 'byor pa ldan par skye //
T02D1221:21a-20: des na bde gshegs mchog gi khyim du lus las bya //
T02D1221:21a-22: de nas lag pa g-yon pa sa la reg par byas la /
T02D1221:21a-23: aom badzra me d'i n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha
T02D1221:21a-24: h'u% zhes brjod pa tsam gyis sa gzhi de sna
T02D1221:21a-25: tshogs rdo rjer gyur par bsam mo //
T02D1221:21a-26: de nas me tog gi tshom bu dkyil 'khor du dgod par bya ste /
T02D1221:21a-27: dbus su aom a'a:h'u% na ma:/
T02D1221:21a-28: zhes brjod de me tog dor ro //
T02D1221:21a-29: shar du ga% goo r'i na ma:/
T02D1221:21a-30: zhes bya bas me tog dor ro //
T02D1221:21a-31: lhor tsam tsoo r'i na ma:/
T02D1221:21a-32: zhes bya bas me tog dor ro //
T02D1221:21a-33: nub tu bam be t'a l'i na ma:/
T02D1221:21a-35: byang du gha% ghasma d'i na ma:/
T02D1221:21a-37: dbang ldan du pam pukka s'i na ma:/
T02D1221:21a-39: me mtshams su sam sa wa r'i na ma:/
T02D1221:21a-41: bden bral du lam tsanda l'i na ma:/
T02D1221:21a-43: rlung mtshams su ni dam dombi n'i na ma:/
T02D1221:21a-45: de dag ni me tog gi tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1221:21a-46: de nas bdag nyid kyi snying ga'i h'u% las 'od
T02D1221:21a-47: zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
T02D1221:21a-48: shangs bug g-yon pa nas zhugs te /
T02D1221:21a-49: thugs ka'i padma la bsnun pa tsam gyis /
T02D1221:21a-50: thugs bskul nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes
T02D1221:21b-0: @21b pa rdo rje'i lha dgu'i dkyil 'khor du sprul
T02D1221:21b-1: te / mdun gyi nam mkha' la byon par bsams la /
T02D1221:21b-2: de'i 'od zer gyi sna la 'jus te 'ongs pa'i
T02D1221:21b-3: bgegs thams cad tshar gcad pa'i bsam pas h'um bzhis
T02D1221:21b-5: de nas aom badzra goo r'i a'a k'arsha ya dza /
T02D1221:21b-6: aom badzra tsoo r'i pra be sha ya h'u%/
T02D1221:21b-7: aom badzra bett'a l'i bandha bam /
T02D1221:21b-8: aom badzra ghasma r'i ba sham ku ru ho:/
T02D1221:21b-9: zhes brjod pas ye shes kyi lha dgu me tog
T02D1221:21b-10: gi tshom bu'i dkyil 'khor la dgug pa dang gzhug
T02D1221:21b-11: pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ste /
T02D1221:21b-12: yi ge brgya pas kyang brtan par bya'o //
T02D1221:21b-14: gti mug gis mnan 'gro bltas te //
T02D1221:21b-15: 'gro ba gti mug zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D1221:21b-16: rdo rje can gyi goo r'i mdzad //
T02D1221:21b-17: de bas goo r'i bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02D1221:21b-18: zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro bltas nas //
T02D1221:21b-19: 'gro ba zhe sdang zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D1221:21b-20: rdo rje can gyi tsoo r'ir mdzad //
T02D1221:21b-21: de bas tsoo r'i bstod phyag 'tshal //
T02D1221:21b-22: nga rgyal gyis mnan 'gro bltas nas //
T02D1221:21b-23: 'gro ba nga rgyal zhi bya'i phyir //
T02D1221:21b-24: gtso bos bett'a l'i gzugs mdzad //
T02D1221:21b-28: gtso bos ghasma r'i gzugs mdzad //
T02D1221:21b-30: bdag med ma dang gnyis med gzugs //
T02D1221:21b-32: ye shes lnga dang sku gsum bdag / rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1221:21b-33: de nas yang aom de ba pi tsu badzra h'u%
T02D1221:21b-34: h'u% h'u% phat sv'a h'a zhes bcom ldan 'das la
T02D1221:21b-35: mchod la / aom aa a'a ai a'i au a'u
T02D1221:21b-36: ri r'i li l'i ae a'ee ao aoo aam aa:zhes
T02D1221:21b-37: bya bas bcom ldan 'das ma la mchod la /
T02D1221:21b-38: yang aom a'asht'a na n'a ya na ma:/
T02D1221:21b-39: aom pim gordha ke sha bartma n'a na ma:/
T02D1221:21b-40: aom tsa tu rbim sha ti nee tr'a ya na ma:/
T02D1221:21b-41: aom sho da sha bhu dz'a ya na ma:/
T02D1221:21b-42: aom krishna dzi m'u ta wa pu she na ma:/
T02D1221:21b-43: aom ka p'a la m'a la aa ne ka dha ri ne na ma:/
T02D1221:21b-44: aom a'adhma ta kr'u ra tsitt'a ya na ma:/
T02D1221:21b-45: aom aardhe ndu dam shti ne na ma:/
T02D1221:21b-46: zhes bya ba rkang pa brgyad kyis mchod do //
T02D1221:21b-47: de nas nang dang phyi dang de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas kyang yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1221:21b-48: phyi rol gyi bya ba'i mchod pas kyang mchod la /
T02D1221:21b-49: aom a'a:h'u% zhes bzlas pa'i me tog dang mchod rdzas thams cad la bsnun pas /
T02D1221:22a-0: aom sarba sa sho dha ni h'u% phat sv'a h'a:zhes bya @22a * //
T02D1221:22a-1: bas dri chab kyis bsangs te /
T02D1221:22a-2: aom badzra ni ri ti h'um zhes bya bas zhabs bsil phul la /
T02D1221:22a-3: aom hri bi shuddha sarba dharm'a /
T02D1221:22a-4: sarba p'a pam nishtsa sam shodha ya /
T02D1221:22a-5: sarba bi kalpa aa pa na ya h'um zhes bya bas zhabs bsil phul /
T02D1221:22a-6: dza:h'um bam ho:kham ram zhes bya bas aa rgham phul la /
T02D1221:22a-9: aom badzra a'a lo ke a'a:h'u%/
T02D1221:22a-11: aom badzra nee bi tye a'a:h'u%/
T02D1221:22a-12: aom badzra shapta a'a:h'u% phat sv'a h'a zhes bya bas go rims bzhin du me tog dang /
T02D1221:22a-16: sil snyan rnams dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1221:22a-17: gzhan yang dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor
T02D1221:22a-18: lo dang bcas pa rnams la bdag dbul bar bgyi
T02D1221:22a-19: lags kyis thugs rje chen pos bzhes su gsol //
T02D1221:22a-20: de nas bstod pa nyi shu pas kyang bstod la /
T02D1221:22a-21: de nas sdig pa bshags par bya ste /
T02D1221:22a-22: ji srid thog ma med pa'i 'khor bar phyin ci
T02D1221:22a-23: log gi rtog pas bsags pa'i las bdag gis bgyis
T02D1221:22a-24: pa dang / bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang
T02D1221:22a-25: ba de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
T02D1221:22a-26: sngar bshags shing phyis sdom par bgyid do //
T02D1221:22a-27: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa 'di lta ste /
T02D1221:22a-28: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D1221:22a-29: so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi'o //
T02D1221:22a-30: bdag byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar
T02D1221:22a-31: du thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i khams gsum
T02D1221:22a-32: bde ba chen por rnam par ro gcig pa'i sangs
T02D1221:22a-33: rgyas dgyes mdzad rdo rje dang /
T02D1221:22a-34: des gsungs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang theg pa chen po'i chos ma lus pa dang /
T02D1221:22a-35: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i chos dang /
T02D1221:22a-36: byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun dang /
T02D1221:22a-37: de'i 'khor lo la 'khor bar gnas pa'i lha mo'i tshogs la bdag skyabs su mchi'o //
T02D1221:22a-38: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D1221:22a-39: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
T02D1221:22a-41: 'di dag ji srid mthar thug pa'i mya ngan las
T02D1221:22a-42: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dgod pa'i
T02D1221:22a-43: phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T02D1221:22a-44: byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
T02D1221:22a-45: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1221:22b-0: sdig pa thams cad @22b so sor bshags //
T02D1221:22b-1: 'gro ba'i dge la yi rang ste //
T02D1221:22b-2: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D1221:22b-4: de nas bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i lam 'di nyid la brten par bya'o //
T02D1221:22b-5: bdag nyid kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la lus 'bul lags kyis //
T02D1221:22b-6: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams kyis bzhes su gsol zhes lus 'bul te /
T02D1221:22b-7: de nas smon lam gdab par bya ste /
T02D1221:22b-8: rigs skyes rjes su ma nyams shing //
T02D1221:22b-9: dam tshig can dgyes rdo rje 'chang //
T02D1221:22b-10: snying rjer ldan zhing bla mar gus //
T02D1221:22b-11: skye zhing skye bar bdag gyur cig / lag na rdo rje dril bu 'khrol //
T02D1221:22b-12: zab mo'i chos ni 'don pa dang //
T02D1221:22b-13: btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can //
T02D1221:22b-14: skye zhing skye bar bdag gyur cig / he ru ka dpal bdag gyur nas //
T02D1221:22b-15: sems can kun gyi don yang byed //
T02D1221:22b-16: he ru ka yi go 'phang mchog thob nas //
T02D1221:22b-17: sems can ma lus 'di la 'god cing 'jog par
T02D1221:22b-18: shog / de ltar bstod pa'i mchod sbyin las ni
T02D1221:22b-19: rdo rje rigs mchog tu ni bdag myur skye gyur
T02D1221:22b-20: cig / sems can phan phyir yang dag thabs kyis
T02D1221:22b-21: yon tan dang ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs bzhin bdag gyur
T02D1221:22b-22: cig / rnal 'byor ma kun la ni dpe med
T02D1221:22b-23: bde ster rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du bdag gyur
T02D1221:22b-24: cig / phyag rgya drug gis bdag brgyan dur khrod
T02D1221:22b-25: gnas su tshangs par spyod dang ldan par bdag gyur
T02D1221:22b-26: cig / de'i 'og tu yi ge brgya pas cho
T02D1221:22b-27: ga kha bskang zhing bshags pa bya ste /
T02D1221:22b-28: aom badzra he ru ka sa ma ya /
T02D1221:22b-30: he ru ka tve no pa tishtha /
T02D1221:22b-32: su to shyo me bha ba /
T02D1221:22b-33: aa nu rakto me bha ba /
T02D1221:22b-34: su po shyo me bha ba /
T02D1221:22b-38: ku ru h'um ha ha ha ha ho //
T02D1221:22b-39: bha ga wan sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me mu nytsa /
T02D1221:22b-41: ma h'a sa ma ya satva aa h'u% phat:/
T02D1221:22b-43: ye shes lha aom a'a:h'u% badzra mu:/
T02D1221:22b-44: zhes bya bas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1221:22b-45: dam tshig gi lha bdag gi thugs kar bsdus la /
T02D1221:22b-46: me tog gi tshom bu dbus su bsdus nas /
T02D1221:22b-47: aom a'a:h'u% bzlas la gzhag go //
T02D1221:22b-48: dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i mandala gyi cho ga /
